name: Arcane Magic
description:
Made for 5th Annual Driftwood Jam. 

The story is about an ordinary village girl Elise,  whose only goal in life is to become a magician. Though she is very bad at magic and only knows one spell. Help Elise on her adventure to become the best mage in the Kingdom!

This is adventure game where you can use items on objects around you as well as using Elise' special spell to overcome various obstacles.
